trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZF204_03485_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> This timid townsviis would like to take you somewhere.
TEXT_LUCKZF204_03485_VIIS03485_000_000<tab>Are you not <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? One of the allies of Ronka?
TEXT_LUCKZF204_03485_VIIS03485_000_001<tab>It is an honor. I was hoping we would meet, actually. There is a place here in the Greatwood I would very much like to show you.

TEXT_LUCKZF204_03485_VIIS03485_000_002<tab>It is a place of leisure, where I hope you might be at ease, if only for a short while. Though I am afraid you cannot reach it on foot. Have you an amaro or perhaps a jaculus to carry you? If so, follow me to the west of the Wild Fete.
TEXT_LUCKZF204_03485_VIIS03485_000_010<tab>Is it not beautiful? The canopy above is like a sieve, leaving only clean rainwater to fall and collect here.
TEXT_LUCKZF204_03485_VIIS03485_000_011<tab>Here in the calm and quiet of the woods, you can close your eyes, take a deep breath, and let your troubles drift away.
TEXT_LUCKZF204_03485_VIIS03485_000_012<tab>The best part of all, is no one knows of this place save for me, my sister...and you. If you ever have need of respite, please do make use of this spring.
TEXT_LUCKZF204_03485_VIIS03485_000_013<tab>Now then, I should return before the others notice my absence. You are free to stay as long as you like.
TEXT_LUCKZF204_03485_VIIS03485_000_020<tab>How do you feel? Refreshed, I hope.
TEXT_LUCKZF204_03485_VIIS03485_000_021<tab>Wonderful. You have done so much for us, you have more than earned a moment of rest.
TEXT_LUCKZF204_03485_VIIS03485_000_022<tab>Duty weighs heavy on your mind, I see. When your work is complete, I pray you find a moment of rest.
TEXT_LUCKZF204_03485_VIIS03485_000_023<tab>Here. A small gift for humoring me.
TEXT_LUCKZF204_03485_VIIS03485_000_024<tab>Take care, ally of Ronka. May the blessings of the wood be upon you.
